"Winged Border-Breaker":
"A number of enemies have suddenly
appeared in the Corrupted Area on
planet Naberius, including Aberrations,
Natives, Dragonkin, Mechs and Oceanids.
Localized thunderstorms and a large
winged enemy have also been observed.
All ARKS are to investigate, and if
necessary, subdue the winged enemy.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area."

"Anga Fundarge readings detected.
It appears to be further ahead."

"Currently, the identity of this winged enemy remains unknown.
Its data matches no previously-observed enemies.
We can't leave this alone."

"We're not certain if this is the cause of the abnormal weather...
Please defeat it immediately."

"-one... Everyone!
Please respond!..
What a relief... We're back in contact."

"What is this place?..
Your coordinates still read as being on Naberius...
But this..."

"This is the most unusual thing we've encountered so far.
I wonder if the enemy's behind this?
I have a bad feeling...
Please be careful!"
